slide.title: Querying: matching array elements ($elemMatch)
slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo;
$c = $m->demo->continent;
$r = $c->find( array(
    'cities' => array(
        '$elemMatch' => array(
            'population' => array( '$gte' => 11000000 ),
            'dem' => array( '$gte' => 100 ),
        )
    )
) );

foreach( $r as $c ) {
    echo $c['name'], "\n";
    foreach( $c['cities'] as $city ) {
        echo '- ', $city['name'], ': ', $city['population'], ' - ', $city['dem'], "\n";
    }
}
?>
